title: Simulation-Based Situated Learning Program for Strengthening Multicultural Competence

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Concepts of a Multicultural Society
context.additional_context: Utilizes smartphone-based VR simulations and mobile learning platforms alongside field-intensive role-playing activities

learning_goals: Analyze and establish resolution strategies for conflicts in multicultural environments through situational learning simulations three or more times
Achieve an 80% or higher understanding of cultural differences through VR-based role-playing
Earn a team performance score of 4.0 or higher (out of 5.0) in participation/creativity metrics for multicultural collaboration projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
